ud3.6:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud3.6:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā pilindavaccho bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati.
ud3.6:3.4: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
ud3.6:3.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
ud3.6:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi:
ud3.6:4.2: “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena pilindavacchaṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantehi:
ud3.6:4.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā pilindavaccho tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.6:5.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā pilindavaccho tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.6:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ pilindavacchaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
ud3.6:5.4: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, vaccha, bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarasī”ti?
ud3.6:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato pilindavacchassa pubbenivāsaṃ manasi karitvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
ud3.6:6.2: “mā kho tumhe, bhikkhave, vacchassa bhikkhuno ujjhāyittha.
ud3.6:6.3: Na, bhikkhave, vaccho dosantaro bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati.
ud3.6:6.4: Vacchassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pañca jātisatāni abbokiṇṇāni brāhmaṇakule paccājātāni.
ud3.6:7.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
ud3.6:8.4: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti.
